No permission is needed. But it cannot dim lockscreen, status bar or navigation bar. And it doesn\'t work in Android 7.0.
Recommended mode. It is stable, although it cannot dim navigation bar and prevent user from clicking \"Install\" or \"Allow\" in permission dialog.
You can dim both status bar and navigation bar. However, it may make screen flashing in some apps.
